Name: Trilobite Fossil
What this fossil can tell us?: Trilobites are index fossils, which geologists use to infer the ages of rock layers. Trilobites allow geologists to date the rocks in which they are discovered and compare them to other rocks of similar ages from around the world.

Name: Fish Fossil
What this fossil can tell us?: We can determine how long life has existed by studying records. We can often figure out how and where they lived, and then utilize that information to learn about past habitats. Animals can't survive without oxygen, hence there aren't any there. The only way a fish or other swimming animal can get fossilized in these conditions is if it dies in oxygen-rich waters above, descends to the stagnant muddy bottom, and is buried by sediments.

Name: Ammonoidea Fossil
What this fossil can tell us?: From dating rocks to verifying the presence of primordial seas, ammonite fossils are an invaluable source of information.

Name: Dinosaur Fossil
What this fossil can tell us?: They provide a concrete link to former life, landscapes, and climates. They demonstrate how life, landscapes, and climate have changed over time, as well as how living things have responded.

Name: Shellfish Fossil
What this fossil can tell us?: Animals can't survive without oxygen, hence there aren't any there. The only way a fish or other swimming animal can get fossilized in these conditions is if it dies in oxygen-rich waters above, descends to the stagnant muddy bottom, and is buried by sediments.

Name: Leaf Fossil
What this fossil can tell us?: Fossil leaves have many different properties. Leaf margins are an indicator of the temperature in which a tree lives or lived.

Name: Microbes Fossil
What this fossil can tell us?: Analysis of fossil microorganisms provides strong evidence to support an increasingly widespread understanding that life in the universe is common.

Name: Coprolite Fossil
What this fossil can tell us?: A new study of fossil microorganisms adds to theÂ evidence that life is common throughout the universe.
